# 🪐 👩‍🎓 Jupyter Education

> Jupyer Education.

```bash
pip install -e .[test]
jupyter labextension develop . --overwrite
jupyter labextension list
jupyter server extension list
yarn jupyterlab
```

- https://github.com/jmshea/jupytereducation
